name: Tower Defense Prototype (EddiePrince)
description:
Don't let the lions attack the farm!

Controls:

- Left Mouse Click  - Place huntresses on the ground

Note:  This is an educational project done by following GameDevTv's 3D Unity Course https://www.gamedev.tv/courses/

Although this prototype  looks simple the coding behind it is very complex.

Disclaimer: All assets used on this game were labeled as free to use on the websites described below. 

If any of the assets used here belong to you and were mistakenly advertised as free to use, please enter in contact and I'll promptly remove them.
